content: sock knitting 101 - basic dk socks dk / cuff down / heel flap & gusset materials - 100g dk weight yarn - us 3 / 3 25mm double pointed needles - 2 removable stitch markers - measuring tape - tapestry needle - snips sizes s m l xl measurements 7 8 9 10 numbers refer to the circumference of the ball of the foot you may want to size down one-two sizes if you prefer a tighter fitting sock abbreviations rs right side co cast-on ws wrong side sts stitches slip 1 wyif slip 1 purlwise with yarn in front bor beginning of round slip 1 wyib slip 1 purlwise with yarn in back k knit ssk slip slip knit p purl k2tog knit 2 together round round p2tog purl 2 together instructions leg co 40 48 56 64 sts and join to work in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place marker for bor round 1 k1 p1 to end of round repeat round 1 until cuff measures 1 5 or desired length be sure to write down how many row you knit for your cuff so you can repeat the same number on the second sock work in stockinette stitch knit every stitch until leg measures 5 from cast-on edge or desired length 1 heel flap knit the first 20 24 28 32 sts begin working the heel flap back and forth across the remaining stitches in the round as instructed below row 1 rs k2 slip 1 wyib k1 to end of round turn work row 2 ws slip 1 wyif purl to end of round turn work row 3 rs slip 1 wyib k1 to end of round turn work repeat row 2 & 3 until heel flap measures 2 2 2 25 2 5 end after a right side row heel turn row 1 ws slip 1 wyif p10 12 14 16 p2tog p1 turn work row 2 rs slip 1 wyib k3 ssk k1 turn work row 3 ws slip 1 wyif p4 p2tog p1 turn work row 4 rs slip 1 wyib k5 ssk k1 turn work continue in the following pattern until all heel stitches have been worked ending after a right side row every ws row slip 1 wyif purl to 1 stitch before the gap created by turning your work p2tog purl 1 turn work every rs row slip 1 wyib knit to 1 stitch before the gap created by turning your work ssk knit 1 turn work you should now have 12 14 16 18 heel stitches gusset pick-up pick up and knit approximately 10 10 12 14 stitches along the left side of the heel flap through the back loop only i recommend picking up every stitch along the heel flap and one extra stitch in the gap even if that is more than the recommended amount extra stitches can be decreased out on the following round this helps to prevent holes knit across
